document.heading: District of Columbia Trust, Loan, Mortgage, Safe Deposit and Title Corporations Act Amendment Temporary Act of 1985

history.narrative: Law 6-34, the “District of Columbia Trust, Loan, Mortgage, Safe Deposit and Title Corporations Act Amendment Temporary Act of 1985,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-241, which was retained by CounciL. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 28, 1985, and June 11, 1985, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 14, 1985, it was assigned Act No. 6-49 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
